name: Callowman Vs. The Star Forces
description:
Callowman Is only Half of a Bad Super Hero, he thinks he is the greatest there is! When the world is attacked by the nefarious Star Forces he doesn't hesitate and begins his heroic assault on the villains. However he causes more harm than good...

Take control of Callowman as you punch, blast and pummel your way through three stages each with their own themes and traps. Face off against many enemies, ranging from the average grunt to star infused robots all in order to, kinda, save the world!

This game was created within two weeks for the 2018 Adventure Jam!

trailer for the game!

This build features the additional post-jam missions, with the Bouncing Hill mission and Double Dystopia mission.

Trailer for the additional levels

I hope you enjoy this silly little game!
